channel.title: Hackthebox on ErbaZZ's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hackthebox on ErbaZZ's Blog

item.title: [Writeup] Hack The Box :: Monteverde
item.description: Monteverde is a Medium difficulty Windows box. You don’t need many fancy techniques to clear this box, as the process is quite clear and straightforward. The important point for this box is enumeration, as the saying goes, “Enumeration is the key”.

item.title: [Writeup] Hack The Box :: OpenAdmin
item.description: Let’s pwn OpenAdmin from Hack The Box. This box is quite easy, as there are multiple ways to get the user flag. One part of the solution I used below is too easy in my opinion, as it could be caused by the overlook of the box creator.

item.title: [Writeup] Hack The Box :: OpenAdmin (Thai Version)
item.description: สำหรับวันนี้ เรามาลองดูเครื่องที่ชื่อว่า OpenAdmin ใน Hack The Box กันนะครับ เครื่องนี้เป็นเครื่องระดับง่าย ที่มือใหม่ก็น่าจะพอเล่นกันผ่านได้โดยไม่ยากครับ

item.title: [Writeup] Hack The Box :: Craft
item.description: Hello! It’s been ages since I’ve updated this blog. This is a writeup for “Craft” on HTB that I have written since last November, when it was still up and running. I have totally forgotten about it until today, which I have just found out that it has been retired. It’s a few months late, and there are writeups on this box everywhere, but here it is.
